unnormalised: Arre yaar, Bharatak 15/08/1947 disa svatantry mell'llem, punn tuka khobor asa kitlo vell zallo mhunn? Kiteakui astolem tem disa!
normalised: Arre yaar, Bharatak pandhra August unnis she chalis ani satak swatantrata mell'li, punn tuka khoreponnank kitlea vellar mell'li mhunn khobor asa? Kitlo tori pisso dis ashtolo!
text: Arre yaar, Bharatak 15/08/1947 disa svatantry mell'llem, punn tuka khobor asa kitlo vell zallo mhunn? Kiteakui astolem tem disa!
